title: Cheeseburger
description: A delicious cheeseburger with a juicy beef patty, melted cheese, lettuce, and tomato, served on a fresh bun.

title: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with creamy carbonara sauce, pancetta, and Parmesan cheese.

title: Sushi Roll
description: A sushi roll with fresh fish, avocado, and cucumber, wrapped in seaweed and rice.

title: Margherita Pizza
description: A classic Margherita pizza with fresh mozzarella, basil, and a tomato sauce base.

title: Grilled Ribeye Steak
description: A perfectly grilled ribeye steak, served with mashed potatoes and seasonal vegetables.

title: Caesar Salad
description: A refreshing Caesar salad with crisp romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.

title: Fish Tacos
description: Tasty fish tacos with a crispy coating, served with fresh salsa and a side of lime.

title: Chicken Alfredo
description: A rich and creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken, served over fettuccine pasta.

title: BBQ Ribs
description: Tender ribs slathered in smoky BBQ sauce, served with a side of coleslaw and fries.

title: Vegan Burger
description: A delicious plant-based patty with fresh veggies and vegan mayo, served in a toasted bun.

title: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Crispy breaded eggplant slices topped with marinara sauce and melted mozzarella cheese.

title: Shrimp Scampi
description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic butter sauce, served with linguine pasta.

title: Falafel Plate
description: Crispy falafel served with hummus, tabbouleh, and pita bread.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
description: Tender chicken cooked in a flavorful tomato-based curry sauce, served with basmati rice.

title: Lobster Roll
description: A fresh lobster salad with a buttery dressing, served in a toasted roll.

title: Peking Duck
description: Crispy duck served with pancakes, hoisin sauce, and fresh cucumber.

title: Beef Wellington
description: A tender beef fillet coated with mushroom duxelles and wrapped in puff pastry.

title: Mushroom Risotto
description: A creamy risotto made with wild mushrooms, Parmesan cheese, and a touch of white wine.

title: Chicken Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings tossed in spicy buffalo sauce, served with a side of ranch.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: A colorful mix of sautéed vegetables in a savory soy sauce.

title: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: A rich chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.
